Framework/src/ldmx-app.cxx
00001 #include "Framework/Process.h"
00002 #include "Framework/EventProcessorFactory.h"
00003 #include "Framework/ConfigurePython.h"
00004 #include <iostream>
00005 #include <string.h>
00006 
00011 using namespace ldmx;
00012 
00025 int main(int argc, char* argv[]) {
00026 
00027     if (argc < 2) {
00028         printf("Usage: ldmx-app [application arguments] {configuration_script.py} [arguments to configuration script]\n");
00029         return 0;
00030     }
00031 
00032     int ptrpy = 1;
00033     for (ptrpy = 1; ptrpy < argc; ptrpy++) {
00034         if (strstr(argv[ptrpy], ".py"))
00035             break;
00036     }
00037 
00038     if (ptrpy == argc) {
00039         printf("Usage: ldmx-app [application arguments] {configuration_script.py} [arguments to configuration script]\n");
00040         printf("  ** No python script provided. **\n");
00041         return 0;
00042     }
00043 
00044     Process* p { 0 };
00045     try {
00046         std::cout << "---- LDMXSW: Loading configuration --------" << std::endl;
00047         ConfigurePython cfg(argv[ptrpy], argv + ptrpy + 1, argc - ptrpy);
00048         p = cfg.makeProcess();
00049         std::cout << "---- LDMXSW: Configuration load complete  --------" << std::endl;
00050 
00051         std::cout << "---- LDMXSW: Starting event processing --------" << std::endl;
00052         p->run();
00053         std::cout << "---- LDMXSW: Event processing complete  --------" << std::endl;
00054 
00055     } catch (Exception& e) {
00056         std::cerr << "Framework Error [" << e.name() << "] : " << e.message() << std::endl;
00057         std::cerr << "  at " << e.module() << ":" << e.line() << " in " << e.function() << std::endl;
00058     }
00059 
00060     return 0;
00061 }
